name: Santa Stranded
description:
A strands type of game.

You are Santa, in a future where zombies have overrun the world.

On your way to deliver the gifts to the last family in the world, your reindeer are eaten by zombies. But the gifts must always go through. You decide to go by foot.

Controls:

WASD to move,

Space to Jump,

Left Click to throw a gift (can kill zombies!).

Good luck!
